titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Larkin Bolin Milton Waldon William Bowlin, & Thomas Sloan, Bond
CWG7255

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Kentucky Russell Circuit Court Sct October Term 1865
The Commonwealth of Kentuck Plaintiff
against } Upon a Sums on forfeited bail bond
Larkin Bolin Milton Waldon William Bowlin ^& Thomas Sloan^ Defts

This day came the attorney for the Commonwealth and the said defendants Milton Waldon William Bowlin and Thomas Sloan being duly summoned failed to answer It is therefore adjudged that the Commonwealth of Kentucky recover of said Defendants the sum of One thousand dollars the debt specified in the summons and forfeited bail bond with interest thereon at the rate of six per cent per annum from this 28th day of October 1865 also her costs herein expended
A copy attest George Bryan clerk R C C

Commonwealth of Ky
vs } Copy Judgt
Larkin Bowlin &c
